The top Democrats on the House and Senate Intelligence committees on Thursday criticized the presence of President Trump 's attorney at a pair of classified meetings between lawmakers and top Justice Department officials . Sen . Mark Warner ( D - Va . ) , the [V: ranking] [ARG2: member] ...
